Thanks very much. How terrifying, and how remarkable that he is remaining so optimistic. 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Thursday, September 3, 2020 10:47 AM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Suicide reconstruction report 
See below from He's asked us to keep it confidential. 
From: MII(OIG) 
Sent: Thurs ay,September 03, 2020 10:39 AM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Suicide reconstruction report 
I don't mind sharing as long as it remains confidential. You can share with as well because it may also impact 
our QPDF case, but please keep it confidential beyond that. 
My simple advise is to enjoy EVERY day with your loved ones, especially your children, and never take your health for 
granted. 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Thursday, September 3, 2020 10:23 AM 
To: =, D. (OIG) 
Subject: Re: Suicide reconstruction report 
I'm glad to hear that you're home. If you're comfortable sharing, I'd love to know what's going on. Regardless, thinking of 
you. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Sep 3, 2020, at 10:22 AM, M, D. (OIG) <

wrote:

Thanks for advising about transfer to Englewood. Can you please expedite the below request relating to Epstein's

I hope you and yours are doing well and staying healthy. 
EFTA00020451

We do not yet have a final version of the suicide reconstruction report, as far as I'm aware. Have you received this 
from BOP/MCC? If so, could you send it to us? If not, could you reach out to your contacts at BOP for the final version 
or an estimated completion date? 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York
